  • Method Details

    • getStockLevels

      List<Ingredient> getStockLevels()
      Retrieves the current stock levels of ingredients.
      Returns:
      A list of Ingredient objects representing the current stock levels.

    • getStockOrders

      List<Order> getStockOrders()
      Retrieves the list of stock orders.
      Returns:
      A list of StockOrder objects representing the stock orders.

    • getMenuDishesAndWineInfo

      List<Dish> getMenuDishesAndWineInfo(int menuID)
      Retrieves the dishes and associated wine information for a specific menu.
      Parameters:
      menuID - The ID of the menu to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Dish objects representing the dishes and associated wine information in the specified menu.

    • getSpecificMenuDetails

      Menu getSpecificMenuDetails(int menuID)
      Retrieves the details of a specific menu.
      Parameters:
      menuID - The ID of the menu to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Menu object representing the menu details.

    • getMenuDetails

      List<Menu> getMenuDetails()
      Retrieves the details of all menus.
      Returns:
      A list of Menu objects representing all menus.

    • getStockOrdersWithinDate

      List<Order> getStockOrdersWithinDate(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves the list of stock orders where expected delivery date matches input dates
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the range (inclusive).
      endDate - The end date of the range (inclusive).
      Returns:
      A list of StockOrder objects representing the stock orders within the specified date range.

    • getStockOrdersByDateRangeAndStatus

      List<Order> getStockOrdersByDateRangeAndStatus(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, String orderStatus)
      Retrieves the list of stock orders within a specified date range and with a specific order status.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date of the range (inclusive).
      endDate - The end date of the range (inclusive).
      orderStatus - The order status to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of StockOrder objects representing the stock orders within the specified date range and with the specified order status.

    • getMenusByStatus

      List<Menu> getMenusByStatus(String status)
      Retrieves the menus with a specific status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter the menus by.
      Returns:
      A list of Menu objects representing the menus with the specified status.

    • getWineByDish

      Wine getWineByDish(int dishID)
      Retrieves the wine associated with a specific dish.
      Parameters:
      dishID - The ID of the dish to retrieve the associated wine for.
      Returns:
      A Wine object representing the wine associated with the specified dish, including its name, type, quantity, and price.
